tern 0.5.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Summary Table by Visit

This function summarizes test results or change from baseline statistics by visit. Corresponds to STREAM table templates EGT01, VST01 and LBT01.

t_summarize_by_visit(data, visit, col_by)

Arguments

data

data frame with numerical variables to be summarized. If the variable has a label attribute then it will be used as the sub-header column name.
visit

factor with visit names ordered by desired display order in the stacked table.
col_by

factor with reference and comparison group information, the first level indicates the reference group

Value

an rtable object

Details

Every variable in data will be mapped to a sub-column under col_by column. Multiple variables will be shown side-by-side with the variable label (if present) or variable name as the sub-column header.

Currently n, Mean (SD), Median, IQR and Min-Max will be derived for each variable from data per each factor in col_by.

Examples


# EXAMPLE 1
ANL <- expand.grid(
  USUBJID = paste0("p-",1:100),
  VISIT = paste0("visit ", 1:10),
  ARM = c("ARM A", "ARM B")
)
ANL$AVAL <- rnorm(nrow(ANL))
ANL$CHG <- rnorm(nrow(ANL), 2, 2)
ANL$CHG[ANL$VISIT == "visit 1"] <- NA
ANL$PCHG <- ANL$CHG/ANL$AVAL*100

ANL$ARM <- factor(ANL$ARM)
ANL$VISIT <- factor(ANL$VISIT)

t_summarize_by_visit(data = ANL[c("AVAL")], visit = ANL$VISIT, col_by = ANL$ARM)
#>                       ARM A               ARM B    
#>                      (N=1000)            (N=1000)  
#> ---------------------------------------------------
#> visit 1
#>   n                    100                 100     
#>   Mean (SD)        -0.06 (0.91)          0 (0.96)  
#>   Median               0.01                0.09    
#>   IQR              -0.68 - 0.54        -0.73 - 0.66
#>   Min - Max        -2.57 - 1.92        -2.96 - 2.08
#> 
#> visit 2
#>   n                    100                 100     
#>   Mean (SD)        -0.16 (0.95)        -0.01 (1.04)
#>   Median              -0.17               -0.02    
#>   IQR              -0.86 - 0.49        -0.6 - 0.66 
#>   Min - Max        -2.15 - 2.1         -3.4 - 2.28 
#> 
#> visit 3
#>   n                    100                 100     
#>   Mean (SD)        -0.03 (1.02)        -0.17 (0.96)
#>   Median              -0.19               -0.13    
#>   IQR              -0.75 - 0.77        -0.83 - 0.4 
#>   Min - Max        -2.21 - 2.54        -2.65 - 2.72
#> 
#> visit 4
#>   n                    100                 100     
#>   Mean (SD)        -0.05 (0.98)        0.15 (0.98) 
#>   Median               0.03                0.19    
#>   IQR              -0.6 - 0.56         -0.61 - 0.84
#>   Min - Max        -2.71 - 2.8         -1.83 - 3.13
#> 
#> visit 5
#>   n                    100                 100     
#>   Mean (SD)        -0.2 (1.08)         -0.02 (1.04)
#>   Median              -0.25                0.04    
#>   IQR              -0.84 - 0.43        -0.72 - 0.56
#>   Min - Max        -3.37 - 2.71        -2.85 - 2.53
#> 
#> visit 6
#>   n                    100                 100

#>   Median              -0.07               -0.22

#> 
#> visit 7
#>   n                    100                 100     
#>   Mean (SD)         0.01 (1.1)           0 (0.99)  
#>   Median              -0.08               -0.04    
#>   IQR              -0.68 - 0.95        -0.72 - 0.63
#>   Min - Max        -2.73 - 2.74        -2.08 - 2.5 
#> 
#> visit 8
#>   n                    100                 100     
#>   Mean (SD)        -0.07 (1.07)        0.04 (1.03) 
#>   Median               -0.1                0.07    
#>   IQR              -0.82 - 0.61        -0.79 - 0.73
#>   Min - Max        -2.32 - 3.41        -2.06 - 2.83
#> 
#> visit 9
#>   n                    100                 100

#>   IQR              -0.83 - 0.56        -0.48 - 0.87
#>   Min - Max        -3.31 - 2.69        -2.98 - 2.16

# Add label to variable instead showing variable name
ANL <- var_relabel(ANL, AVAL = "Value at\nVisit",
                        CHG = "Change from\nBaseline",
                        PCHG = "Percent Change\nfrom Baseline")
t_summarize_by_visit(data = ANL[c("AVAL", "CHG")], visit = ANL$VISIT, col_by = ANL$ARM)

# EXAMPLE 2
library(random.cdisc.data)
library(dplyr)

AQS <- radam("AQS") %>%
   filter(PARAMCD == "BFIALL") %>%
   mutate(
     ARM = factor(sample(c("ARM A", "ARM B", "ARM C"), nrow(.), replace = TRUE)),
     AVISIT = factor(AVISIT, levels = unique(AVISIT))
   )

tbl <- t_summarize_by_visit(data = AQS[c("AVAL", "CHG")], visit = AQS$AVISIT, col_by = AQS$ARM)
tbl
#>                                  ARM A                                     ARM B                                     ARM C               
#>                                 (N=219)                                   (N=231)                                   (N=273)              
#>                        AVAL                  CHG                 AVAL                  CHG                 AVAL                  CHG     
#> -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> WEEK 1
#>   n                     24                   24                   36                   36                   40                   40      
#>   Mean (SD)         0.06 (0.87)             0 (0)            -0.02 (1.05)             0 (0)             0.05 (1.03)             0 (0)    
#>   Median               -0.02                  0                  0.14                   0                  0.07                   0      
#>   IQR               -0.3 - 0.44             0 - 0            -0.63 - 0.81             0 - 0            -0.53 - 0.55             0 - 0    
#>   Min - Max         -1.7 - 1.69             0 - 0            -2.52 - 1.91             0 - 0            -2.34 - 2.09             0 - 0    
#>

# NOT RUN {
Viewer(tbl)
